name: Dungeoneers (Arca)
description:
A very simple 2d game with a massive amount of characters to choose, collect and fight, each one with unique stats and with a variety of abilities that suits each character.

The idea is very simple, collect as many characters you can by killing them with your current character and get to the portal at the end.

Huge potential in level layouts: Some you may need to think to pass, some you may need to fight for your life to get through. Also you will have a huge variety of levels to choose as you progress in the game.

This present build contains only two brief levels, just to show what is planned to come in the near future. (its still not ballanced, so you might have some hard time passing throught)
